extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by verifying the installed version of TruTops Boost, TruTops Fab, or TruTops Monitor.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Is the updated version available via the service channel?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Version via Service Channel
extracted_playbook.description: Use the service channel to update to the latest version of the TRUMPF products to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Hotfix
extracted_playbook.description: Download and apply the hotfix from the provided link to mitigate the vulnerability.
